
LASER
=======

LASER is a symbolic Ethereum virtual machine.

Installation and setup
----------------------

Install from Pypi:

.. code:: bash

    $ pip install laser-ethereum

Usage
------------------

The easiest way to use LASER is by installing Mythril command line tool:

.. code:: bash

    $ pip install mythril
    $ myth --init-db
    $ myth --fire-laser -a [contract-address]
